verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3212><s%> "Go again, <S%H157><s%> love a woman <S%H802><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> by another, <S%H7453><s%> and an adulteress, <S%H5003><s%> even as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H160><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> though they turn <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> cakes <S%H809><s%> of raisins. <S%H6025><s%>"
So I bought <S%H3739><s%> her for myself for fifteen <S%H6240><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%> and a homer <S%H2563><s%> and a half <S%H3963><s%> of barley. <S%H8184><s%>

I said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H3427><s%> "You shall stay with me many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%> You shall not play the prostitute, <S%H2181><s%> and you shall not be <S%H1961><s%> with any other man. <S%H376><s%> I will also be so toward you."

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall live <S%H3427><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> without king, <S%H4428><s%> and without prince, <S%H8269><s%> and without sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> and without sacred stone, <S%H4676><s%> and without ephod <S%H646><s%> or idols. <S%H8655><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> their king, <S%H4428><s%> and shall come with trembling <S%H6342><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> and to his blessings <S%H2898><s%> in the last <S%H319><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
